text:
Salah satu cabang Favehotel dengan letak yang strategis, berada di jantung kehidupan area Pluit, Jakarta Utara. Awalnya agak bingung di mana letak pintu masuk hotelnya, karena traveler harus masuk ke dalam area mal baru bisa mengakses hotel. Untuk traveler yang membawa kendaraan, kendaraan bisa diparkirkan di area parkir Mal Pluit Junction. Akses mudah juga bagi para traveler yang bepergian menggunakan jasa Transjakarta, karena hanya berseberangan dengan Halte Penjaringan. Akses ke pintu TOL menuju airport ataupun ke dalam kota Jakarta sangat mudah dijangkau. 

Harga yang ditawarkan termasuk ramah dikantong, dibandingkan beberapa hotel sejenis di sekitar lokasi ini. Kalau saya menginap di sini dikarenakan keperluan transit, sebelum melanjutkan perjalanan wisata ke Kepulauan Seribu, melalui pelabuhan Muara Angke. Mungkin Favehotel cabang ini cukup cocok disebut hotel transit dan bisnis, karena untuk fasilitas hiburan seperti area bermain anak, swiming pool, atau hiburan lainnya, belum dapat ditemukan di sini. 

Selama menginap di sini, overall cukup nyaman dan cukup puas. Kualitas kasur yang baik serta kebersihan yang terjaga. Namun, yang dinding dengan gipsum di kamar saya, mengurangi penilaian saya dan kenapa harus ada dinding gipsum di hotel macam ini ? Selama saya sering melakukan staycation ataupun menginap di hotel, tempat ini doang, yang tiba-tiba ada dinding gypsum hahaha... Serta, pintu kamar mandi yang terbuat dari kaca, unik, tetapi pada saat dibuka mengeluarkan bunyi yang sempat membuat saya kaget. Oh ya, pada saat saya menginap juga, breakfast harusnya sudah siap jam 6.00am, tetapi saat itu agak sedikit keterlambatan, huff... Namun, tempat ini sangat saya rekomendasikan untuk beristirahat di saat anda memiliki perjalanan lanjuta atau transit, karena lokasinya yang strategis.
title: Airport, Kep. Seribu, atau Dalam Kota Jakarta ? Transit Sini Dulu

text:
Daerah Pluit dan Mura Karang adalah salah satu daerah di ujung Jakarta Utara yang menawarkan beragama piliha kegiatan. Untuk Anda yang berbisnis dan urusan keluarga,  atau sekedar datang untuk menikmati Jakarta Anda bisa memilh hotel ini karena letaknya startegis. Dari bandara, supir taksi pasti tahu letaknya karena persis di perempatan Mall Emporium. Naik busway juga mudah. Anda tinggal turun dan menyebarng, tidak lebih dari 5 menit Anda sudah tiba di Pluti Junction. Hotel ini berada di dalam Pluit Junction. Mall ini tidak besar, tapi sepi dan hanya ada fasilitas makan yang terbatas, bioskop kelompok 21 dan karaoke serta pusat kebugaran.  Tempat yang mudah dijangkau dari bandara dan akses ke pusat kota lewat Busway adalah salah satu kekuatan hotel ini. UNtuk kamar, saya pikir tidak terlalu okay karena beberapa kamar menggunakan papan gipsum. Fasilitas di dalam kamar sesuai standar Fave. Yang saya kruang suka adalah sarapan. Kurang variatif mungkin karena kelas dan harganya juga. 
Sekali lagi, ini pilihan tepat untuk aktivitas Anda di daerah sekitar Pluit dan Muara Karang.
title: Pas untuk daerah Pluit dan Muara Karang

text:
I am not lucky stay at this Hotel ... I am better wrote in Bahasa Indonesia
Dengan pertimbangan lokasi yang dekat dengan tempat yang akan saya tuju akhirnya saya memilih Hotel ini . Hotel ini saya booking dari situs yang menyediakan jasa Hotel yang berkantor pusat di Bangkok dengan harga yang sedikit mahal dari ekspetasi saya 

Berlokasi di pusat kota daerah Pluit dan terletak dalam Mall Pluit Junction , anda harus teliti untuk mencari lokasi Lobby hotel ini . Tiba pada pukul 17.00 waktu setempat , hanya ada satu staff yang bertugas sambil melayani registrasi saya - staff tersebut juga harus menerima telpon . 

Kamar Superior yang saya pesan ternyata tidak mempunyai jendela untuk melihat keluar . Kondisi kamar sangat sederhana dan hanya unggul luas 1-2 meter dari keadaan kamar jenis standard . 
Keadaan yang berisik pada malam hari sangat mengganggu kenyamanan dan kualitas tidur saya . 

Untuk breakfast , jelas jelas apa yang diberikan hanyalah sekedar untukmengenyangkan isi perut anda tanpa memikirkan kualitas dari makanan yang disediakan oleh Restoran .
title: Saya tidak beruntung

text:
Lokasi = sangat strategis, karena dekat dengan bandara & mall sehingga tidak perlu khawatir dalam mencari makanan atau hiburan.

Harga = langsung book di website hotel untuk harga yang lebih murah.

Pelayanan = sangat baik dan ramah, dari front desk hingga room boy.

Breakfast = kurang menarik namun tidak buruk. Pilihannya dikit, tetapi rasanya lumayan.

Kamar = kecil namun nyaman, kebersihan tidak perlu diragukan. Kamar mandi juga sangat luas untuk ukuran budget hotel. Dilengkapi free wifi juga.

Note : pada malam pertama dan kedua, air dalam kamar mandi kurang bersih, sehingga untuk kumur-kumur saya menggunakan air mineral. Namun pada malam ketiga, air sudah lebih bening.
title: Chic & simple

text:
30 menit dengan mobil (bukan masa puncak) dari bandara, bangunan sederhana ini terletak di seberang Emporium Mall. Anda akan dimanjakan dengan pilihannya - banyak opsi makanan serta Carrefour yang besar, toko-toko kecil dengan keranjang, dan yang berkaitan dengan butik. Starbucks di Jakarta besar. Satu di sana dan yang lain terletak di mal di bawah hotel ini. Poin bagus lainnya - 61 saluran kabel. Tanpa lemari pendingin atau pengering rambut di kamar. Sarapannya standar.

Masa puncak untuk lalu lintas ditetapkan pada jam-jam antara 7 dan 9 pagi hari dan 4-7 di petang hari.

Jika pengunjung tiba di terminal 2, seperti saya, perhatikan bahwa orang asing dan mereka yang memiliki visa - status kedatangan, lebih baik hanya melanjutkan ke set eskalator pertama. Set kedua dipesan untuk status diplomatik dan di antaranya warga Indonesia.

Formulir bea cukai, jika tidak diberikan saat terbang, sudah tersedia di counter meja di sebelah kanan sebelum klaim barang bawaan.
title: Kamar deluxe, dengan sebuah pemandangan

text:
Kami memesan untuk menginap satu malam di hotel ini termasuk penjemputan di bandara. Menurut apa yang ada di situs, kami harus menunggu konfirmasi untuk proses penjemputan. Setelah 5 hari, akhirnya saya menghubungi mereka lewat surat elektronik, karena kami tidak kunjung mendapatkan konfirmasi. Mereka menghubungi kami kembali dan semuanya telah diatur. Seorang sopir akan menunggu kami di bandara, dengan membawa tulisan yang menyebut nama saya di atasnya.
Kami mendarat tepat waktu di bandara tetapi tidak ada sopir yang menunggu kami. Tak berapa lama, kami akhirnya mengerti karena kota Jakarta sedang mengalami banjir. Tentu saja, hal itu tidak bisa dikira-kira, jadi kami mengerti. Tetapi setelah kami menelepon pihak hotel, mereka tidak meminta maaf dan mengatakan kami harus naik taksi. Jadi, kami lakukan. Kami menunggu 3 jam hingga giliran kami untuk mendapatkan sebuah taksi. Kami memberitahu tujuan yang ingin kami tuju kepada sang sopir. Lalu, ia mengatakan bahwa hal itu tidak mungkin. Kenapa pihak hotel tidak memberitahukan hal tersebut kepada kami sebelumnya ? Jadi, kami harus menghabiskan malam di bandara. Tidak ada surat elektronik maupun telepon dari pihak hotel sama sekali. Pelayanan paling buruk yang pernah kami terima.
title: Pelayanan yang ada sangat buruk.

text:
Pertama saya memesan hotel ini melalui Agoda. Dan saya sangat marah karena tidak ada jendela di kamar. Saya juga tidak bisa pindah ke kamar lainnya. Kamar tersebut mempunyai konsep ruangan modern dan minimalis. Ketika saya masuk ke kamar, tempat tersebut cukup bersih. Tetapi, hal yang sangat mengecewakan ialah banyak noda darah yang ada di seprei tempat tidur. Saya rasa mereka tidak pernah menggantinya. Tetapi, Puji Tuhan, pegawai yang ada cukup baik dan membantu. Mereka dengan segera mengganti seprei tersebut. Hanya ada satu meja (lemari) di kamar tersebut. Juga, lemari tersebut rapuh dan perlu perbaikan. Saya hanya mendapatkan dua handuk mandi tanpa handuk kecil. Tidak ada sandal (meskipun saya memintanya kepada pihak hotel, mereka tidak pernah membawakannya kepada saya). Tidak ada lemari pakaian, hanya tempat gantungan pakaian. 
Tetapi, hal bagus yang ada yaitu mereka mempunyai layanan wifi yang dapat diakses di kamar. Tetapi, saya tidak tahu apakah mereka mempunyai masalah dengan listrik yang ada, karena laptop saya sering mati tiba-tiba ketika baru digunakan 10 menit, tak lebih.
title: Sangat,sangat..

text: Alasan kenapa saya tidak mau berkomentar mengenai hotel ini yaitu karena dengan berbuat demikian, saya akan mendapatkan persaingan untuk bisa menginap di hotel tersebut pada waktu selanjutnya. Hotel yang bersih dengan pusat perbelanjaan yang dekat. Para pegawainya yang ada sangat ramah dan hangat, entah di bagian resepsionis, layanan kebersihan, maupun di ruang makan. Hal tersebut membuat saya merasa bahwa mereka sangat rendah hati hingga tidak menilai diri mereka sendiri sebagai layanan kualitas dengan bintang  yang lebih tinggi, yang seharusnya mereka terima. Sebuah tempat belanja yang buka 24 jam akan didirikan di dekat hotel. Saya melihat iklannya pada minggu yang lalu.
title: Hanya pendapat saya.

text: Hari jumat sabtu yang lalu saya menginap di Hotel Fave Pluit..hotel kecil, harganya terjangkau untguk kantong saya namun didalamnya seperti hotel berbintang 4, sepertinya di kelola secara professional. Saya dan keluarga sangat menikmati, karena pelayanannya juga bagus seperti pelayanan pada hotel berbintang 4. Makanan di restaurantnya sangat enak, makanan Internationalnya sangat lezat, sesuai dengan rasa yang sebenarnya meskipun porsinya agak kurang buat saya.
title: Hotel bagus harga terjangkau ...

text: Friendly and helpful staffs, surrounded by shopping malls (next to Favehotel/ across the street by foot), easy public transportation such as Grab (Uber), great Local Food, room clean and fresh during my stay, and Best free Local Tea and Coffee that available in room.

text:
I stay 2 days in this hotel.
The location is quite strategic, located in front of the emporium mall.
The hotel is also actually located in a pluit junction shopping center.
I booked a superior room at the price of 500k idr. Room size is not too big.
The most in pity is, there is no window in my room. So I do not know whether it is morning or still night.
Breakfast options are limited.
This hotel is okay if only to sleep only. But I think the price is quite expensive for the 2 star hotel, compared with the facilities that I get.
By adding around 100k IDR I can get 3 or 4 star hotels nearby with better facilities.
title: an ordinary hotel

text: Recently stayed 2 nights in the hotel. The beds are firm and comfortable. Bedding and linen is clean. Find that the pillow is too soft for me. Only provide 2 bathtowels and 2 toothbrushes in the bath. Of there are 2 more tumblers and a small hand towel will make it better. Too basic and does not provide tissue paper as well. Its a pity as I do not think these cost too much to provide. Otherwise I would give a 5 star rating.
title: Convenient Location. No Frills Hotel

text:
average hotel. best choice for budget hotel. remember advanced booking and request for non smoking room. 

level. 2-4 non smoking floor. 5th level is smoking zone floor 

(+) :
- fast check in and check out 
- location connected to pluit junction Mall. although the mall is half dead. since there's not much shops. except there's still celebrity Fitness, xxi, starbucks and Amazon for kids. but still walking distant just opposite emporium pluit mall, a much much better shopping mall. 
- satellite TV cable and free WiFi on the room 

(-) :
- smoking zone area and room don't have any exhaust. should have installed air purifier. bad smell if you're non smoker. stay out of this area as you will already feel the smell once you step outside from the elevator. room has no exhaust for smokers. 
- if you have car and park in the hotel area. you can't register for free parking by the system. too bad you always need to get the parking ticket to the reception to get a free parking chop. which I found hassle to do this. 
- limited seat for breakfast area.
title: bad smoking zone floor with no exhaust

title: GOOD SERVICE

text:
Stayed here for a family's wedding, we booked 9 rooms for our relatives. The let down was the late check-in, other hotels might allow us to check in at 12 or earlier, here was check-in at 2 pm at least. Some of my family member came from outside Jakarta, they can not get the room even tough they were arrived in hotel at 4 pm. So it was bit of a let down because they were tired of the long journey & traffic to get to the hotel, but still had to wait for the staff to clean the rooms. They must waited for about 2 hours before they finally got the room, so around 6 pm to check in?! That's unacceptable.

The hotel are 5 stories of the building, but they only had 1 elevator, for both guests and services. And there were no stairs or emergency exit as far as i concern. So that's probably the main reason why it took long times for guests to be able to check-in at time. And makes me wonder, what if anything emergency ever happen..

The location was quiet strategic, inside pluit junction mall, but it also was at the heart of pluit's traffic jams. The mall was ok, you can easily find foods & restaurant there, but it was more like itc then mall. If you're looking for shopping experience you should just walk across the street to emporium mall, there has more proper stores & brands for shopping.

The rooms was quite pack in one floor, they only seperate the rooms with gypsum not walls, so it can be a bit inconveniece If you unluckly has noisy neighbours. Inside the room was nice, we had the superior room, there were enough spaces, clean & simple. The bathroom was clean. The windows are facing to the corridor, so there was no window view. 

The breakfast are so so, the restaurant are bit small and crowded in the morning, But you can always find foods from around the mall. Overall this is a budget hotel that are enough if you wanna spend a night or two.
title: Need to improve the check-in time

text: The AC was leaking, and the guy who came to fix it was smelling like cigarettes REAL BAD, and could not get the smell out before several hours, and he made a whole directly outside when he tried to fix the AC, letting mosquitos free passage to the room, making it a very uncomfortable night with many mosquito bites. When it started leaking again the day after we got a new room, but the AC didnt work, as it didnt come any cold air out of it. when we was shown a new room, the staff who showed us the new room for some reason said the AC worked fine when there was no cold air coming out, even after 30 minutes. Will not stay here next visit, much better at Holiday inn on the other side of the street.
title: Had 2 change rooms 2 times!

However, when I requested for a late check out @ 1.30 -2.00 latest. FO officer told me that the management has denied my request and would charge extra 25% if I am shaking out later than 1.00pm.

If this is under an ordinary situation, I would understand. But, with an unwell guest? I think it is not so nice to do, especially in the hospitality Industry.

Foods are ok. But FnB people need some upgradings, especially in managing tables and arranging cutlery.
title: Not so good as reviewed

text:
Near the Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, Jakarta, it's the main reason me and my family stay at this hotel for a night. It's location also next to one of the biggest mall in north Jakarta, Mall Emporium. 

Facility include a hot water, very comfy and clean room, and a very good receptionist are my three main excelent point for my review about this budget hotel. Hot water always available even on a hotel busy hour like in the morning. Very clean, neat, and minimalist design are fit on my taste. The bed are soft enough and keep your body not to sink into it. The receptionist are very helpful, even in last minutes requests like non smoking and connecting room-combo. 

It's a pleasure to stay at this hotel. Too bad we spent it only for a single day. Will be staying here again in the near future.
title: A Very Good Value Hotel

text:
I was booked in here for a 10 day stay while here on business.  The rooms are actually not a bad size, but you pay more if you want the luxury of a window! To be honest, the view isn't spectacular, unless you like traffic!  Reception staff are brilliant, and happy to help.  The hotel is very clean, but very basic.  It's situated in a mall.  This is a work in progress,and doesn't have any useful stores but does actually have Starbucks.  

Across the street is a much bigger mall, with lots of places to eat, and a supermarket, and also a big movie theater!  If you go to watch a movie, take the Premiere option. It's superb value! 

The rooms have very good A/C and also free wifi, plus free bottled water.  Sadly, they have no tea/coffee making facilities.  Buffet breakfast is part of the deal, but unfortunately, it's the same 5 choices every single day.  You can get boiled eggs or omelette, but only after 0700. Oh, and make sure you cover yourself in 'repellant' before you go for breakfast.  Seems like the Mosquito population go there to dine, too!  An evening meal is cheap enough, here.  Local dishes and a couple of western, but not a huge selection.

If you need a taxi, just ask at reception for a 'Blue Bird'.  They are very reliable, but you may want to have Google Maps open on your phone, to make sure you are going the right way!

If you would like a cold beer, it's probably cheaper to buy in the supermarket, and take it back to your room, as the hotel price is double.
title: Good for short stay, and nothing more!

text:
Stayed in the hotel in early March 2015 for few days.

The people working at front desk are quite friendly and helpful.

The room is small and there are no windows.

The amneties are poor,
no closet nor drawer to put your clothes in.
No electric stove to make coffee in the morning or cup noodles at night.
No safety box available.
No small fridge to keep the water and beverage cool.
The toiletries are nothing to be proud of.

The wall is not sound proof, so can hear people walking in the hall way, music from discotheque at night, and worst, hearing people moans having sex at night, which happening to me one night and it was awkward.
I am a light sleeper, so noise is no good for me.

The bathroom are always flooding to the water closet area when I shower.
It is very poor drainage system they are having.
And the mirror are having lots of spots that you can see when it is covered with hot steam.
Which shown it might never cleaned properly by the room cleaning folks.

And speaking of room cleaning staff,
we find one of them have been toying with our goods and toiletries.
We find many bottles of our toiletries turned to other side of the bottles from backward to faceward, such as perfume and body lotion, and the content was missing albeit slightly, which we suspect might have been used by them.
We had to hide our things inside our suitcase ever since when we going out for the day whilst staying in this hotel.

The free wi-fi is just not very good.

We got free breakfast with our room,
but there are no much choice and the taste of the foods are nothing special.
There are no packed jams for toast, instead they put a couple of big jars of it on the toast station which was looking unappealing for me.

The hotel located inside a mall.
And the mall offers nothing to enrich the experience of staying there.
So many shops closing. It feels barren.

There are more upscale mall literally across the road, Emporium Pluit ehich offers more for shopping and foods.
But the problem is, there are no safe mean to cross the road, not even zebra cross.
My heart always racing when I cross the roads going there  just for some leisure cos Jakartans drivers are known not very caring with pedestrian.
They won't stop for you, unlike in more humane big cities such as Singapore.

Overall, We would think twice before we recommend this hotel to our family, friends, and relative.
I think it is good place for staying only for a night or two tops.
Or even more so if you are back packers that are really tight with budget.
There are better hotels offering more than they do with similiar price range in Jakarta.
title: Average at best, need more improvement

text:
First came in, really could not find the entry since the entrance door was the same door with the Pluit Junction Mall and the signage was too small. 
Came to the reception desk, the staff was very helpful and did the check-in process quite fast. The hotel lobby weakness was no seating for the guest to wait, the guest redirected to have seat on the breakfast restaurant chair which located next to reception desk. But it was not comfortable lah. Then i went to the room through Guest Lift. Note, the guest lift used access card. So no one could go upstairs without the access card. This was good for security reason. 

And finally i was at the room. The room was so small, but the toilet room was quite ok. Just the shower area without door and the water spilled out until the wash basin area, yet still inside the toilet room. So the water would not go outside the toilet. The toilet had hot and cold water. 

No cabinet and no bathrobe. You had to hang up your cloth above the table. It looked untidy. The safety box was there, so you no need to worry if you need to save your money. 
During my stay, the AC was leaking especially in very early morning. 

I was ordering fried rice for lunch from room service. With total net of IDR67,000 i had fried rice and one free iced tea. Actually i still entitled of one free pudding, but it was not available. So sad. The hotel should replace it with other item for example fruit platter. Anyway, the fried rice tasted good.

The next day, i had breakfast at the lobby area. The restaurant name was Tomodachi. The menu was good, and the taste was good. I had eather western and eastern menu of breakfast.

Overall stay i could say it was ok. Recommended if you had short stay for individual and couple.
title: Budget hotel with good service

text:
I stayed in this place for a long weekend on my way to another part of Asia. The staff here all speak a good level of English, as do most customer-facing staff in Jakarta.

The room itself was squeaky clean as you would expect, but the towels and bedding were showing their age a bit. Though I must say that the bed itself was super comfy with big deep pillows that you just disappear into. 

A strange thing about this hotel is that it vibrates, rather like being on a ship as it's moving away from the quayside. You feel and hear it most in the dining area, where coffee cups and plates actually rattle. It's not constant, and there was no pattern to when it came and went. But you can feel it when you are in bed on the 2nd floor. I asked the staff what it was, but they never gave me an answer that made any sense.

Other than that, the WiFi is strong, it showed 5MBPS download and 4MBPS upload in my room on the 2nd floor.

Its location takes about 25 minutes from the international airport. A metered taxi costs about 80,000 Ruphia. But I should say that its location is a fair trek away from some of the points of interest, due to the terrible traffic jams in the city overall.
title: Good value, with some strange quirks.

text:
I've stayed in this hotel for years since they opened. Everytime I comes to JKT I always stays here mostly because it has the most strategic place for me to unwind and relax due to its close proximity to my favourite massage place (Nano) which is just 5 minutes walk from the hotel, so it saves me time n money for taxi. 

The room is pretty standard, comfy bed, free wifi, safety box and great TV channel is a plus. But none of their room type comes with bath tub, the shower is poor coz d water pressure is very weak, water temperature is pretty inconsistent and it has static shower head, I would much prefer if it's a flexible hose. Also will be nice if they provide a mini fridge in d room.

For breakfast, it's from 7-10am. My advice is better come really early when d breakfast just started if u want to have a good meal. If u come a bit later like 9:30, most of the tray is empty and it's not getting refilled unless u ask d service staff for it. But d breakfast varieties is good enough to sustained u til dinner time. My favourite is the hot soups and fried noodles coz they change different type everyday and taste yummy. d rest is pretty much d same everyday (fried rice, chicken porridge, fruits, toast bread). Oh yeah, u can also custom made request for how u want to cook ur eggs. Chef Zainul was really nice and pleasant and listen to feedback to improve food n service. We appreciate that.

Also they have free shuttle service from and to airport at certain time, but if u need to go outside of their free shuttle schedule it's only cost about AU$18 one way which is pretty convenient.

I am sad to see how miserable and quiet d mall itself had become compared to when I first stayed here in 2013. Each year I came, less and lesser shop stays open. It would've been great if the management can solve this problem, otherwise I don't know what will happen to fave hotel if they closed down d mall coz d hotel is part of d mall. I'll b very sad.
title: My Home Sweet Home in Jakarta

text:
This hotel is near the airport, about 20 minutes. It is actually inside the Pluit Junction mall which has Starbucks, Billiards, Nail salons and even a cinema at the top floor. Take note though that it is hard to find someone speaking English in the mall (aside from those in the hotel). I understand this is a child hotel (or however it's called) of the bigger Aston Hotel which is more high-end.

Entering the hotel, you'll see the reception immediately to the right and the restaurant straight ahead. The hotel is trendy but be warned that some rooms have frosted window bathrooms so there is a silhouette when taking a shower. The room we got didn't have a window (placed in the inner of the U-shaped hallway). Rooms on the outer U-shape generally have bigger bathrooms than those inside. Towels and tissue are replaced everyday. The only bad thing about is that sometimes the air conditioning unit leaked a bit and that there is no closet (just a place up high to hang clothes on), no hair dryer, no slippers and shower items can only be bought. 

Food and massage services are available. Food is paid for directly when it is delivered. The food was great and the breakfast included was awesome as well! 

For electronics, there's only one 2-prong plug, the rest were some kind of socket for round plugs. There is a small safe to keep important things in. The instructions to use it in are in English and understandable. There is a big flat screen TV mounted on the wall but most of the shows are in Indonesian. We only had it on the movie channels.

Across the hotel is the Emporium Mall, a bit more high-end and bigger. From the hotel, several shopping areas like the ITC Mangga Dua and the Grand Indonesia Mall, are just a few minutes drive away.

Overall, a good place to stay at!
title: Good Budget Hotel

text:
I stayed in a Superior Room for one night as I needed to leave early the next morning for the airport. This is a budget hotel conveniently located near an entrance to the highway to the airport (~20min). So this is a good cheap alternative to an airport transit hotel. The room is small and rather basic; there is a safe but be warned that there is no wardrobe. The toilet is quite big and shower cream is provided but you will have to pay for some basic amenities like a toothbrush. But this is expected in a budget hotel.  

However, while the location is conveniently located near the airport and to food and some shopping (but I cant comment on the mall as I did not go there), be forewarned that this area is rather prone to flooding in the monsoon season. I nearly could not make it to the airport as the the entrance to the airport highway was flooded and the taxi driver was not keen to risk it. Luckily he agreed after I agreed to compensate him for vacuuming and drying his carpets if they got wet... which they did!!

Anyway, overall a decent hotel in a very convenient location. Good value for the price paid and met my needs for a overnight stay at a clean, safe and conveneint budget hotel. Will stay here again, especially when it is not in the monsoon season.

Overall
title: Budget Hotel near to the airport

text:
This hotel is more for the business/leisure for a quick and easy access to the surrounding if you are planning to meet someone or to do things around the region. Room facilities and cleanliness are the average, was expecting a little bit more when chose to upgraded to the superior room.

Hot/cold shower tap has been mixed up, in fact the cold water is the hot water and vice versa. Air cond is dripping water and could potentially a tripping and safety hazard.

'Free Breakfast' for the stay sounds great until you actually see the limited choices and warm to cold food. Not expecting too much but that was one of the most undesirable meals. Thought it was just one of the day of bad selection, but went down the next day for 2nd go for the breakfast and found myself yet another limited choices and looked like left over food.

Apart than the facilities, cleanliness, and qualities and choices of breakfast. 1 thing that really pleased me was the friendliness of the staff especially 'Romie' the concierge/driver. He was at the airport waited me for more than 2 hours due to flight delayed. despite of the long waited in the hot weather, he was still greeted me with a big smile and acted professionally to ensure I am fine from the airport till I checked in to my room. other staff members are the Front desk were equally friendly and always willing to assist whenever possible.

If not because of the staff friendliness, I would actually asking to check out the next day instead of staying over for 4 days during my trip to Jakarta.

Hope the management would take this feedback seriously and recheck all rooms, and facilities to ensure no issues as well as review your breakfast menu and choices. You have the best staff as an asset for your hotel. If all the little issues are looked into and fixed, no doubt I will come back to stay in future.
title: Average hotel, great service staff

text:
I choosed this hotel, simply by its location to the Waterboom PIK. I prefer the fave hotel since they have their own Aston standard.

The first time, I had difficulty finding this hotel. Using this GPS not helping so much. After asking several people I found this hotel. actually it was behind me, but since it was integrated with the shopping mall, we didn't notice it. But for sure it lacked of hotel signage.

Just never imagine that the hotel lobby itself was inside the shopping mall, we had to pass dunkin donuts, starbucks to get to the lobby.
The lobby was tiny altogether with the tomodachi restaurant. Evertyhing was efficient, the trademark of the budget hotel. 

The reception service was standard and even quite slow, too many administration that caused me to wait for a while, even I was the only one there.

The room was nice, neat and well maintained. Tiny.. as I mentioned before the budget hotel superior size, and I didn't expect it to be spacious too.

The most disappointing to me was the bathroom. The size, the interior and the amenities were nice. I checked-in in the afternoon, after the long journey I expected to have a hot shower. but...what happened then? There was not hot shower available, not even warm.
I waited and waited , better than nothing I took the cold shower bath.

That's not only it, the water from the shower cabin flooded the main bathroom and flooded into the main bed room. The level of the shower cabin floor was not sufficient to hold the water from the shower itself. It was wet everywhere and I had to block the water using all the towel available. This serious problem in the bathroom should be put on the high priority attention.

Breakfast was fine, nothing to complain about. Just the position of the restaurant that facing directly to the east with the big glass window really burned the guests in the breakfast area.
There was no curtain, shade,blind or even sandblast sticker to hold the heat of the morning sunshine.

Having breakfast as fast as possible was the only solution, since it was not comfortable.
The main mistake also was serving the juice, sliced fruits and drinking water directly next to the window that spray the morning heat. Fruit got drier faster, the water getting muddy and the juice would be getting stale faster I think.

Even I know that Tomodachi as the provider of the breakfast was not the part of the hotel, but somebody must take accountable for it.
title: Ruined by the Bathroom

text: The only plus about this 'hotel' is location. Other than that, nothing really impressed me.  We booked a superior room. When we were first given a room on a non smoking floor, the room had terrible cigarette smell. I called the front desk for a room change but was asked to wait for 5 mins, they wanted to spray the room with air freshener. I was like, what??? The room had been contaminated with cigarette and there's no way I was going to stay in that nasty room. The receptionist told me they were full house and only had a non smoking standard room or a deluxe room in the smoking floor. I had no choice but to downgrade to the standard room. text:
The hotel is recently open and located within the Pluit Junction Mall. It has direct access to the toll gate and about 15 km from the airport.

Stayed there when (I think) it was partially open, and the lift from the hotel lobby was not ready so we have to use the mall's lift (the hotel have direct access to the mall, lift & elevator was only like 5 meter from the lobby). Plenty of entertainment in the mall, including F&B, shopping, movie theater, etc. and if they're not enough there's a bigger mall (Emporium Pluit) just opposite the property.

I assume the hotel was a conversion of a wasted space, because the mall opened long ago and it was not there before. As I walk through the hallway I noticed they have some rooms in the core with sealed windows facing the inside and it will be very dangerous as they don't have any alternative emergency exit from the room other than the door.

Luckily my room have windows facing outside and somewhat spacious (stayed in superior), furniture was good but the AC positioning was terrible since it blow straight to the head-side of the bed. Bathroom was clean and sleek, just a little bit larger than other budget hotels but they provide no shower door (good design if a hotel have huge bathroom, but this hotel does not), therefore water splattered all over the bathroom every time I shower.

Breakfast was limited, but its ok. Wifi is free in the lobby and room.

Should you ever "forced" to spend the night in Jakarta but are looking for something more than an airport hotel (as we know the Jakarta airport sucks), this will be a good place to stay.

Service of the room, restaurant, even security etc. were all good, with the exception of the front desk girl giving me a grim when I checked in.
title: Good location, within a shopping mall & access to the airport

text:
我在 Favehotel 和酒店的经历是很好，与一家购物中心，独特的酒店在机场附近。友好的工作人员，很好的服务。我是在餐厅或大堂不管怎么说，因为他们都很友好。晚餐在餐厅，酒店，有时我的朋友们和我有良好的服务，从 Abi，更好地理解语言的印度尼西亚。不要忘记餐厅工作人员非常友好。缺乏，并不是餐厅的 24 小时开放

舒适的酒店，安静，独特和趋势

不要花很多钱，我们推荐一家经济型酒店

有趣、 新鲜和友好!!!
title: Fave hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Chen_Taiyin,

Warmest Greetings from Favehotel Pluit Junction – Jakarta..

Thank you so much for choosing Favehotel Pluit Junction - Jakarta and for taking the time to giving us such a great feedback.

I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and also happy to received your comments regarding our friendly staff, location, and the comfortable hotel. 

Please be sure that the whole team is grateful with your positive review and it’s a truly support to our commitment to always improve our service in order to meet our guest expectations.

We are looking forward to welcoming you again as our guest at Favehotel Pluit Junction - Jakarta.



Best Regards,

Jack Yaaro ZEGA
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: 早餐不错，餐厅Dewi服务很到位哦。不足的是网络WIFI有点slowly。注意，DEWI服务员美女很漂亮哦，各位单身狗们抓抓紧，多泡泡妹子。总的来说酒店还是不错的。
title: 总体还不错吧

owner_response.text:
Dear A TripAdvisor China Member,

Warmest Greetings from Favehotel Pluit Junction – Jakarta..

text:
スカルノハッタ空港のトランジットにて利用。
空港からはタクシーで20分ほど高速出口からすぐのところにある。
付近は街中なので退屈せずに過ごすことができる。
電気ポットがないのと、水道の水質が悪いのが気になった。
喫煙可能な部屋もある。
title: トランジットに便利

owner_response.text:
Dear 10元,

Warmest Greetings from favehotel Pluit Junction – Jakarta..

We sincerely appreciated you taking your value time to inform us your recent experience with us.

We are most concerned with the satisfaction of our guest and we thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, it allows us to ensure and improve the quality of facilities and service and we can assure the necessary steps have been taken to avoid such inconvenience happen in the near future.

We hope you will give us another chance to welcome you again and experience the better stay with us.

Best Regards,

Jack Yaaro ZEGA
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Nieuw hotel dat in een mall staat. Hierdoor is er altijd de mogelijkheid om wat te eten in de buurt. De locatie is niet ideaal omdat bezienswaardigheden ver uit de buurt liggen. Je moet ook over drukke wegen wanneer je met de taxi ergens naartoe gaat dus je kan weinig doen op een dag.
Verder is het hotel erg schoon en nieuw en de kamers zijn ruim en goed ingericht.
title: Goede prijs/kwaliteit verhouding

owner_response.text:

Warmest Greetings from favehotel Pluit Junction – Jakarta..

Once again, thank you for your kind feedback and we’re looking forward to welcoming you again as our valuable guest in favehotel Pluit Junction – Jakarta.

Best Regards,

Jack Yaaro ZEGA 
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: どうしてもジャカルタに１泊することになったけど、ただ泊まるだけでいい。。そんなときはここを選ぶと思います。お部屋が清潔で、シャワーも水周りも安心。向かい側にプラザ・エンポリウムがあるのでお買い物も歩いて行けます。エコノミーなホテルとして使用するにはこれで充分という感じ。
title: ベスト・エコノミーホテルに選ばれたホテル・チェーン
